item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 15, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Sign in as anyone: Bypassing SAML SSO authentication with parser differentials (110 points | 30 comments)
2. Milk Kanban (257 points | 104 comments)
3. How many artists' careers did the Beatles kill? (112 points | 60 comments)
4. Show HN: A personal YouTube frontend based on yt-dlp (160 points | 86 comments)
5. They're Close to My Body: A Hagiography of Nine Inch Nails and Robin Finck (2020) (59 points | 20 comments)
6. Lemma for the Fundamental Theorem of Galois Theory (84 points | 23 comments)
7. Hexagon Spiral Coordinates (33 points | 5 comments)
8. Parahelp (YC S24) Is Hiring Founding Engineers (SF) ( | hide)
9. Wyvern's Open Satellite Feed (12 points | discuss)
10. Sunset Geometry (2016) (69 points | 9 comments)
11. The Day Hobie Made Nixon a Surfboard (36 points | 16 comments)
12. Show HN: Aiopandas – Async .apply() and .map() for Pandas, Faster API/LLMs Calls (13 points | 1 comment)
13. AutoHete: An Automatic and Efficient Heterogeneous Training System for LLMs (12 points | discuss)
14. Show HN: Fashion Shopping with Nearest Neighbors (51 points | 16 comments)
15. Computers and Mice – Mister Rogers Neighborhood (61 points | 15 comments)
16. Arbitrary-Scale Super-Resolution with Neural Heat Fields (122 points | 42 comments)
17. Collatzeral damage: bitwise and proof foolish (5 points | discuss)
18. How to learn a new language like a baby (13 points | 3 comments)
19. Evidence that Neanderthal and Homo sapiens engaged in cultural exchange (17 points | 7 comments)
20. What Bikini Atoll Looks Like Today (2017) (78 points | 24 comments)
21. So Long and Thanks for All the Words: A Toast to Douglas Adams (178 points | 59 comments)
22. A Polyomino Tiling Algorithm (2018) (16 points | discuss)
23. Show HN: Metacheck – preview how any link appears on social media and chat apps (114 points | 26 comments)
24. RubyLLM: A delightful Ruby way to work with AI (566 points | 148 comments)
25. Transformers Without Normalization (221 points | 29 comments)
26. Briar: Peer to Peer Encrypted Messaging (386 points | 153 comments)
27. A look at Firefox forks (472 points | 321 comments)
28. For climate and livelihoods, Africa bets big on solar mini-grids (85 points | 60 comments)
29. Athena landed in a dark crater where the temperature was -280° F / -173° C (217 points | 242 comments)
30. Mayo Clinic's secret weapon against AI hallucinations: Reverse RAG in action (159 points | 69 comments)
